summary: A very small mod that just puts a small campsite South East of \"Bleakwood Basin\" that is the Giants camp West of \"Whiterun\"
descriptionHtml:
[Heading] [color=00FF33] Introduction [/color] [/heading]

[color=yellow] [b] This is tiny mod that adds a small campsite called the [i] \"Blacksmiths Campsite\" [/i] that is located west of Whiterun. [/color] 
[color=FF3399] Do not worry as the Map Marker is active once you start up your game and you will be able to travel there immediately. [/b] [/color]
[color=red] [i] This may be changed in the future [/i] [/color]

[Heading] [color=red] [b] Notes: [/b] [/heading] [/color]

[color=red] * [/color] [color=yellow] [u] [b] For the users that are getting \"Floating grass\" in the middle of the camp, tweak the .ini files. [/u] [/b] [/color]
[color=red]
\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\

[list] [b] Skyrim.ini & SkyrimPrefs.ini
[i] Under [ grass ] section (If you do not have it, create it)
[/b] 
[*] bAllowLoadGrass=0
[*] bAllowCreateGrass=1
[*] bDrawShaderGrass=1 
[/list] [/i] [/color]

[b] [list]
[*] [color=yellow] [u] The symbol * represents updated and recently added content [/u] [/color] [/list]
- [color=red] Red * [/color] = V1.1.0


[img] http://i.imgur.com/UhvUA9n.png [/img]

[list]
[*] This is at it\'s early Alpha stages and is nothing but a small campsite
[*] it is recommended that if you would like to use my mod \'Track\' it as I have many ideas to evolve this tiny mod. 
[*] It may take me a long while as I do not have much time to spare to be updating this mod.
[*] I do not have any custom Meshes or Textures *Yet, but I hope to in the future [/b] 
[/list]

[heading] [color=orange]  Recommended [/color] [/heading]
[list]
[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25179]Serious Mammoth Bone Retex HD[/url] by Sukhonali
[/list]

[heading] [color=orange] Contents: [/color] [/heading]

[b] Campsite: [/b]
[list]
[*] [i] Campfire
[*] Big Tent
[*] Small tent
[*] Mammoth Rib Cage
[*] Blacksmith\'s forge
[*] Grind stone
[*] Cooking pot
[*] Chairs
[*] Slightly scenic location [/i] [/list]

[b] Main tent: [/b] [list]
[*] [i] Bedroll
[*] Chest
[*] Small Table (Map, Ink pen, \"The Blacksmith\'s Journal\")
[*] [color=red] * [/color] A book called \"The Blacksmith\'s Journal\" which contains a vague back-story
[*] Interior Lantern [/i] [/list]

[b] Small Tent: [/b] [list]
[*] [i] Bedroll
[*] exterior candles [/i] [/list]

[b] Mammoth Rib House: [/b] [list]
[*] [i] Bedroll
[*] Workbench
[*] Tanning Rack [/i]
[/list]

[heading] [color=orange] Features [/color] [/heading]
[list]
[*] [color=red] * [/color] Fixed landscaping and floating grass issues
[*] Removed grass from campsite location to eliminate grass clipping issues
[*] Tweaked lights so they don\'t shine too bright [May still need tweaking]
[*] Used a \"Warm lighting feel\"
[*] [color=red] * [/color] [color=orange] [b] Added \"The Blacksmith\'s Journal\" It contains a vague back-story. [/b] [i]  (intended for a later quest.) [/i] [/color]
[/list]

[Heading] [color=orange] Issues/Incompatibilities [/color] [/heading]
[list]
[*] None reported yet
[/list]

[heading] [color=Red] Ideas [/color] [/heading]
[list]
[*] May make another campsite somewhere in the snowy cold areas.
[*] [color=red] * [/color] [s] May make a Journal showing why the blacksmith has abandoned his camp. [/s]
[*] May make a quest some time later.
[/list]
 
[heading] [color=cyan] [b] Further Notes [/heading] 
Please endorse if you like this mod [/b] [/color]
author: welshboy99

files.name: Blacksmiths Campsite - Old
files.changelogHtml:
Uploaded Mod
Flattened ground in 'Landscape editor'
Removed grass from the campsite area
Fixed some clipping issues
Tweaked Nexus Mod page

files.name: Blacksmiths Campsite - Main
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed major landscape problems
Fixed "Floating Grass" and "Floating Rocks" Bug
Added a small table inside the main tent
Added "The Blacksmith's Journal" which contains a vague back-story and is intended for a future quest
Tweaked lighting
